trends: There has been one other sighting in Santiago de Surco
There was one other sighting in Santiago de Surco on or around May 4th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: that thing looked like a star, but it stills static
divs: Sighting Detailssorry but I don't know english very well...I speak spanish I was sleeping when my mum woke me up at 5:30 am. She said me look! what it's that?? (and she opens the window because I live in a appartment), so I saw to the dark sky and I see a point or something like a star but it was alone, the sky hadn't any other star, well I still looking that and waited also I took some photos with my movil , I saw like little paws appear around from the star or whatever that it was, I don't know what that thing could be but it didn't move it stays in the same place all the time until the sun appears and sunrise, I couldn't see it after.
